bibl.title: Byzantine Inventory Lists of Food Provisions and Utensils on an Ashmolean Papyrus.
bibl.note: P. Ashm. Inv. 33 (Petrie Box C32). On one side, inventory of supplies in food and drink; on the other, inventoy of utensils and food provisions. Provenance unknown, V/VI AD.
bibl.seg: MARAVELA-SOLBAKK Anastasia, Byzantine Inventory Lists of Food Provisions and Utensils on an Ashmolean Papyrus.
P. Ashm. Inv. 33 (Petrie Box C32). On one side, inventory of supplies in food and drink; on the other, inventoy of utensils and food provisions. Provenance unknown, V/VI AD.
